metadata.Title: CalculateSoilTemperature
metadata.Extended description: Calculation of minimum and maximum Soil temperature, Further used in shoot temperature estimate.
metadata.Short description: Compute daily minimum and maximum soil temperature and update deep layer temperature.

process.name: CalculateModel
process.description: Compute states.minTSoil and states.maxTSoil and update deeplayerstates.deepLayerT

inputs.name: lambda_
inputs.description: Latente heat of water vaporization at 20°C

inputs.name: deeplayerstates_deepLayerT
inputs.description: Temperature of the last soil layer

inputs.name: exogenous_maxTAir
inputs.description: Maximum Air Temperature from Weather Files

inputs.name: exogenous_minTAir
inputs.description: Minimum Air Temperature from Weather files

inputs.name: ratesexternal_heatFlux
inputs.description: Soil Heat Flux from Energy Balance Component

outputs.name: deeplayerstates_deepLayerT
outputs.description: Temperature of the last soil layer

functions.name: Estimate
functions.description: Public entry: calls CalculateModel and handles exceptions

functions.name: CalculateModel
functions.description: Main routine computing min/max soil temperature and updating deep layer temperature

functions.name: SoilMinimumTemperature
functions.description: Compute minimum soil temperature as the minimum of SoilTempA and SoilTempB

functions.name: SoilMaximumTemperature
functions.description: Compute maximum soil temperature as the maximum of SoilTempA and SoilTempB

functions.name: SoilTempA
functions.description: Compute soil temperature based on weather max/mean, soil heat flux and lambda_ (energy-based estimate)

functions.name: SoilTempB
functions.description: Compute soil temperature as the average of weather min and deep layer temperature

functions.name: UpdateTemperature
functions.description: Update deep layer temperature using weighted mean of previous deep temperature and daily mean soil temperature

functions.name: TestPreConditions
functions.description: Verify preconditions (input ranges and parameter validity)

functions.name: SetParametersDefaultValue
functions.description: Set parameters (e.g., lambda_) to default values

functions.name: SetStaticParametersVarInfoDefinitions
functions.description: Define static VarInfo metadata for parameters
